concept.title: Amazon S3
concept.shortdesc: The Amazon S3 origin reads files stored in Amazon S3. The file names must share a prefix pattern and should be fully written.

conbody.p: originsAmazon S3Amazon S3 originoverviewWith the Amazon S3 origin, you define the region, bucket, prefix pattern and optional common prefix. These properties determine the files that the origin processes.
After processing a file or upon encountering errors, the origin can keep, archive, or delete the file.

When the pipeline stops, the Amazon S3 origin notes where it stops reading. When the pipeline starts again, the origin continues processing from where it stopped by default. You can reset the origin to process all requested files.
You can optionally use a proxy to connect to Amazon S3.
